# Analysis of cars data
## by Arfan Shah

**Part 1**
```{r}
data(cars)
str(cars)
summary(cars)
plot(cars)
```

**Part 2**
```{r}
hist(cars$speed)
boxplot(cars$dist)
```

**Part 3**\
The average speed of cars is `r mean(cars$speed)`.\
The median speed of cars is `r median(cars$speed)`.\
The mode of cars' speed is `r mode(cars$speed)`.\

# THE END
